      static PsiDirectory mkdirs(PsiManager manager, java.lang.String path)
      Creates the directory with the given path via PSI, including any necessary but nonexistent parent directories.

    • Method Detail

      • mkdirs

        public static PsiDirectory mkdirs(PsiManager manager,
                                  java.lang.String path)
                           throws IncorrectOperationException
        Creates the directory with the given path via PSI, including any necessary but nonexistent parent directories. Must be run in write action.
        Parameters:
        path - directory path in the local file system; separators must be '/'
        Returns:
        true if path exists or has been created as the result of this method call; false otherwise
        Throws:
        IncorrectOperationException
